snippet: Two varieties of camels and their Mongolian riders are featured in the latest edition of the Ringling Brothers and Barnum & Bailey Circus.
abstract: Ringling Brothers and Barnum & Bailey Circus, opening its 145th edition at the Barclays Center, will feature two varieties of camels and their Mongolian riders.
lead_paragraph: Two varieties of camels and their Mongolian riders are featured in the latest edition of the Ringling Brothers and Barnum & Bailey Circus.

headline.main: Ringling Circus Camels, One Hump or Two, Are Singular Attractions
headline.print_headline: One Hump or Two? Try Both
